ModuleConfigurations.Name: DiagnosticStorageAccount
ModuleConfigurations.Comments: Storage Account that is used to store diagnostic information as raw logs

Policies.Comments: Optional - If no object is specified, no Policies deployment will occur

Deployment.Comments: TemplatePath and ParametersPath are optional, if specified, the engine will use the relative path specified instead of deriving one for you.

ModuleConfigurations.Name: EnableServiceEndpointOnDiagnosticStorageAccount
ModuleConfigurations.Comments: Enables Service endpoint on the Storage Account

ModuleConfigurations.Name: ArtifactsStorageAccount
ModuleConfigurations.Comments: Storage Account that is used for ...

Policies.Comments: Optional - If no object is specified, no Policies deployment will occur

Script.Command: Write-Host 'Adding Scripts...'; Import-Module -Name Az.Storage; $ctx = New-AzStorageContext -StorageAccountName reference(ArtifactsStorageAccount.storageAccountName) -SasToken '?reference(ArtifactsStorageAccount.storageAccountSasToken)'; New-AzRmStorageContainer -Name scripts -ResourceGroupName reference(ArtifactsStorageAccount.storageAccountResourceGroup) -StorageAccountName reference(ArtifactsStorageAccount.storageAccountName); Get-ChildItem -LiteralPath '../../Scripts/Windows' -File -Recurse | % { Set-AzStorageBlobContent -Context $ctx -Container scripts -Force -File $($_.FullName) -Blob Windows/$($_.Name)}

ModuleConfigurations.Name: ActiveDirectoryVM
ModuleConfigurations.Comments: Creates Active Directory Domain Services VMs

ModuleConfigurations.Name: InstallActiveDirectory
ModuleConfigurations.Comments: Creates Active Directory Domain Services VMs

ModuleConfigurations.Name: ActiveDirectoryDomainServicesVMs
ModuleConfigurations.Comments: Creates Active Directory Domain Services VMs

ModuleConfigurations.Name: EncryptActiveDirectoryDomainServices
ModuleConfigurations.Comments: Encrypts Active Directory Domain Services VMs using bitlocker
